Title: Qud Fishing
Description:
This mod adds fishing to Caves Of Qud! Now you can make or find a fishing rod and use it to capture delicious fish from various water pools! Sitting on a chair increases your chance of catching things. Adds a skill in Cooking & Gathering for Fishing which increases the variety of things to be caught and also allows you to cast your line once and then keep fishing while you wait in place.

To fish equip a fishing rod and then interact with water. You will cast a line. Ä¯If you are successful you will reel in a fish! If you have the fishing skill you can pass turns after casting your line to keep fishing and have a higher chance to catch a wider variety of fish.
